thread.title: Kourtney Kardashian's former partner Scott Disick reportedly enters Malibu rehab - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Kourtney Kardashian's former partner Scott Disick reportedly enters Malibu rehab - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Kourtney Kardashian's former partner Scott Disick reportedly enters Malibu rehab - Showbiz
text: Kourtney Kardashian's former partner Scott Disick is reportedly in rehab once again.The Keeping Up with the Kardashians star checked into a Malibu treatment centre in recent days for undisclosed issues, reports People. © Startraks Photo/Rex Features Digital Spy has reached out to Disick's management team for comment.The apparent rehab stint follows a few months after Disick split from long-time partner Kardashian, amid claims of the club promoter's infidelity.Earlier this year, Disick checked into a separate treatment programme in Costa Rica to conquer "the struggle" of alcohol dependency.Kardashian and Disick were together for nine years and have three young children together.The Kardashian family are currently dealing with the hospitalisation of Khloé Kardashian's former husband Lamar Odom in Nevada.
